title: Make a book
text:
1 Introduction
Book about building a book in Quarto and publishing on github.io

title: 2  Steps
text:
2.1.1 Github account
Create a github account at github.com


2.1.2 Download
Download Quatro


2.1.3

title: 2  Steps
section: 2.2 Steps to set up the book
text:
2.2 Steps to set up the book

2.2.1 Create github repo
Go to your github site and create a new repository (repo) for the book with and meaningful name for the book. This repo will also be the name of your RStudio project (see below).



New repo
